name: The Adventures of Linda Rum Raisin
name_original: The Adventures of Linda Rum Raisin
description:
The Adventures of Linda Rum Raisin is a non-linear, 2-D platformer designed to challenge and never hold the player's hand. Play as Linda Rum Raisin, a lost little doll, as she reclaims her missing body parts and traverses a dangerous backyard to find her long lost owner.

Game currently does not have a save feature.
